input.sentences: today | we went to the fairmont olympic hotel to celebrate the holidays .
there was so much good food laid out | including appetizers !
my favorite appetizers were the shrimp kabobs with peanut dip sauce .
we all sat down at the big table to enjoy our three course fancy meals .
after eating a big dinner | we took a group picture in the lobby of the hotel .
output.sentences: The Olympic Hotel had a very grandiose feel about it, almost intimidating as the Smith family entered the lobby.
Everything was already laid out for them, including a buffet with lots of food.
Grandma was extremely excited to see shrimp, and Aunt Bertha couldn't wait to get a hold of that yummy peanut sauce.
The hotel had prepared a large table next to a bright window, where everyone sat to enjoy their meals.
On the way out, the smith's relaxed for a while in the hotel lobby, where one of the bellboys took a picture of the group.
